abi: event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
event PropertyCreated(uint256 indexed id, address tenant)
event RentPaid(uint256 indexed id, uint256 saved)
event SavingsWithdrawn(uint256 indexed id, uint256 amount)
function createProperty(address _tenant, string _roomLabel, uint256 _rentAmount, uint256 _savingsPercent, uint256 _savingsGoal)
function properties(uint256) view returns (address tenant, string roomLabel, uint256 rentAmount, uint256 savingsPercent, uint256 totalSaved, uint256 savingsGoal, uint256 lastPaid)
